search_cmp.search_query: Percentage of servers running Linux Informative

results.title: Linux - Wikipedia
results.explanation: All claims are directly present in the original text.

results.title: How to properly share and access shared folder on network (Linux ...
results.explanation: The original claim is about the majority of servers running Linux, while the text focuses on a specific case of sharing media on two individual Linux systems using Samba. The solution provided in the article implies that the default username and password set in Kubuntu 18.04 can be used for accessing shared folders via SMB, which is related to the original claim.

results.title: Usage share of operating systems - Wikipedia
results.explanation: The original claims discuss the shift from mainframe computers to personal computers and then mobile devices. The new claims focus on the operating systems used in specific types of computers (mainframes, IBM Z, supercomputers), which is a similar topic.
